meanings.definition: A temporary work experience program for students in a professional field.
meanings.sent1: During the externships, students learn about real work.
meanings.sent2: Many students participate in externships to gain experience.
meanings.sent3: The externships turned out to be more fun than expected.
meanings.sent4: Externships are like a sneak peek into the professional world.
meanings.sent5: The externships made a lasting impact on the students' careers.

meanings.definition: The act of participating in an externship.
meanings.sent1: Her externships were filled with valuable learning opportunities.
meanings.sent2: Participation in externships is crucial for career development.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his externships were like mini adventures.
meanings.sent4: Externships can be a gateway to new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The externships opened doors to exciting possibilities.

meanings.definition: To gain practical experience through an externship.
meanings.sent1: Students externship to learn hands-on skills.
meanings.sent2: She will externship at a top company next summer.

meanings.sent4: Externship as if every moment counts.
